titles.title: A bill to extend the temporary suspension of duty on bitolylene diisocyanate (TODI).
A bill to extend the temporary suspension of duty on bitolylene diisocyanate (TODI).

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

bill.summary: Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to extend the temporary suspension of duty on bitolylene diisocyanate (TODI).
